title: [CLIENT] after dodging by not confirming a game. afk punishment restarts
body: in he old client if you lock in champion and you idk. go to bathroom and someone dodges. and then next queue obviously you couldn't hit yes. you didn't have the timer rest. but now it does. just letting you know. this is annoying

replies.body: My best advice here is to make sure you're ready and at your pc for those matches. I know I know, we all need to use the bathroom and such, and even I have been kicked from a match because I went to the bathroom at the worst possible time. But all in all, once you've entered the Q or champion select, your other teammates are counting on you to be there and ready for the match.

I feel you there, really I do. I'll do my best to bring this up to those who might be able to help with how the Q is designed, but I can't promise anything. If you want to get more visibility on this, I'd suggest posting it over in Client Discussion. That way you can get more feedback from the community and who knows, maybe you'd spark a change!
